Replaced PyQt5 with PySide6 in all import statements.
Replaced call to pyqtSignal() with Signal()
Replqces QFontMetrics(x).width() with QFontMetrics(x).boundingRect().width().
Replaced QtCore.QT_VERSION_STR with PySide6.QtCore.__version__
Replaced QPrinter.SetOrientation with setPageOrientation(QtGui.QPageLayout.xxx)
Replaced QPrinter printer.setPageSize(QtPrintSupport.QPrinter.xxx) with setPagesize(QtGui.QPagesize.xxx)
Replaces QRegexp with QRegularExpression
Replaced QRegExpValidator with QRegularExpressionValidator
Replaced all exec_ method calls by exec
